Highlights in Jazz #21: Chet Baker & Frank Foster (Tape 2 of 3)
Highlights in Jazz #21: Chet Baker & Frank Foster (Tape 2 of 3)
Performers on this recording include Frank Foster, Chet Baker, Bob Mover, Hal Galper, Dave Shapiro, Jimmy Madison, and Gene Bertonicini.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate to severe flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies in low lighting. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are frequent mild dropouts, and occasional tape damage. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
